document.title: Reduction of 3-CNF-SAT to Perl Regular Expression Matching
document.abstractNote: 3-CNF-SAT is NP-complete. If there were an efficient (polynomial-time) algorithm for computing whether or not a regex matched a certain string, we could use it to quickly compute solutions to the 3-CNF-SAT problem, and, by extension, to the knapsack problem, the travelling salesman problem, etc. etc.
document.author: Hans Dampf
Paula Paulsen
